KnowledgeItem.Title: AptUpdateSourceWorkflow
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for updating APT Source by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock AptUpdateSourceWorkflow and triggers the workflow for successful completion

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks
				TargetMachine=${AUSW:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${AUSW:User}
				Lib=APTSOURCEMODIFICATION
				PKG=mongodb-org
				Host=${AUSW:Host}
				AptRepoUrl='${AUSW:AptRepoUrl}'
				AptArchiveType=${AUSW:AptArchiveType}
				AptDistribution='${AUSW:AptDistribution}'
				AptComponents=${AUSW:AptComponents}
				AptKey=${AUSW:AptKey}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				/> </NewBlock>
